Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc19
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.Networking.Server

Class ClientHandler

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Thread
it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.Networking.Server.ClientHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
ObserverMessageToClient<MessageToClient>, Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ClientHandlerRMI, ClientHandlerSocket
public abstract class ClientHandler extends Thread implements ObserverMessageToClient<MessageToClient>
This class represents the "network interface" with which server can communicate with one client both sending and receiving messages. It implements an Observer<MessageToClient> so that an Observable of MessageToClient can push in its queue their messages.

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      This method overrides Thread.run(). It is used to send message to client accordingly to its dynamic type. If an InterruptedException occurs when messageQueue is not empty, thread will keep sending the remaining messages, interrupts itself and returns.
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable
      Overrides:
      run in class Thread

      queue of the incoming messages

    • sendMessageToClient

      public abstract void sendMessageToClient(MessageToClient message)
      This method is abstract. It must be implemented by all class extending ClientHandler in order to send message to client through the network
      Parameters:
      message - message to be sent

    • update

      public void update(MessageToClient message)
      This method is used by Observable to push a MessageToClient message inside the queue of messages to be sent to client through the network.
      Specified by:
      update in interface ObserverMessageToClient<MessageToClient>
      Parameters:
      message - is the message to be pushed inside the queue

    • sendMessage

      protected void sendMessage() throws InterruptedException
      This method picks a message from the queue and send calls the appropriate method for sending it through the network (RMI or TCP for this project) with ClientHandlerRMI.sendMessageToClient(MessageToClient)
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if an InterruptedException is received
